OK, i looked at the website, and typed "hello".  It replied with "Hello, how are you?".  I answered with "fine.  How are you?"  He said " Glad to hear it. What's new? Fair to partly cloudy."  So that put's my trust in him down to almost zero.

But the, considering the fact that I just saw I, Robot 4 times on DVD, and being able to relate to Will's character (Detective Del Spooner), I'd be likely to take that stance.  I trust AI about as far as I can throw it.

As for being able to do something like that, well, that's a different story.  It would be hard, very hard.  So, I say, good luck, but you'll be sitting at your computer for weeks, probably months, trying to achieve anything close to something like Sonny from I, Robot.
